019package org.jdrupes.vmoperator.common;
020
021import com.google.gson.Gson;
022import io.kubernetes.client.Discovery;
023import io.kubernetes.client.apimachinery.GroupVersionKind;
024import io.kubernetes.client.common.KubernetesListObject;
025import io.kubernetes.client.common.KubernetesObject;
026import io.kubernetes.client.custom.V1Patch;
027import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.ApiClient;
028import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.ApiException;
029import io.kubernetes.client.util.Strings;
030import io.kubernetes.client.util.generic.GenericKubernetesApi;
031import io.kubernetes.client.util.generic.KubernetesApiResponse;
032import io.kubernetes.client.util.generic.options.PatchOptions;
033import java.util.Optional;
034import java.util.function.Function;
035
036/**
037 * A stub for namespaced custom objects.
038 *
039 * @param <O> the generic type
040 * @param <L> the generic type
041 */
042@SuppressWarnings("PMD.DataflowAnomalyAnalysis")
043public class K8sGenericStub<O extends KubernetesObject,
044        L extends KubernetesListObject> {
045    private final GenericKubernetesApi<O, L> api;
046    private final String group;
047    private final String version;
048    private final String kind;
049    private final String plural;
050    private final String namespace;
051    private final String name;
052
053    /**
054     * Instantiates a new namespaced custom object stub.
055     * @param group the group
056     * @param version the version
057     * @param plural the plural
058     * @param namespace the namespace
059     * @param name the name
060     */
061    protected K8sGenericStub(Class<O> objectClass, Class<L> objectListClass,
062            ApiClient client, String group, String version, String kind,
063            String plural, String namespace, String name) {
064        this.group = group;
065        this.version = version;
066        this.kind = kind;
067        this.plural = plural;
068        this.namespace = namespace;
069        this.name = name;
070
071        Gson gson = client.getJSON().getGson();
072        if (!checkAdapters(client)) {
073            client.getJSON().setGson(gson.newBuilder()
074                .registerTypeAdapterFactory(
075                    new K8sObjectStateTypeAdapterFactory())
076                .create());
077        }
078        api = new GenericKubernetesApi<>(objectClass,
079            objectListClass, group, version, plural, client);
080    }
081
082    private boolean checkAdapters(ApiClient client) {
083        return K8sObjectStateTypeAdapterFactory.K8sObjectStateCreator.class
084            .equals(client.getJSON().getGson().getAdapter(K8sObjectState.class)
085                .getClass())
086            && K8sObjectStateTypeAdapterFactory.K8sObjectStatesCreator.class
087                .equals(client.getJSON().getGson()
088                    .getAdapter(K8sObjectStates.class).getClass());
089    }
090
091    /**
092     * Gets the group.
093     *
094     * @return the group
095     */
096    public String group() {
097        return group;
098    }
099
100    /**
101     * Gets the version.
102     *
103     * @return the version
104     */
105    public String version() {
106        return version;
107    }
108
109    /**
110     * Gets the kind.
111     *
112     * @return the kind
113     */
114    public String kind() {
115        return kind;
116    }
117
118    /**
119     * Gets the plural.
120     *
121     * @return the plural
122     */
123    public String plural() {
124        return plural;
125    }
126
127    /**
128     * Gets the namespace.
129     *
130     * @return the namespace
131     */
132    public String namespace() {
133        return namespace;
134    }
135
136    /**
137     * Gets the name.
138     *
139     * @return the name
140     */
141    public String name() {
142        return name;
143    }
144
145    /**
146     * Get a namespaced object stub. If the version in parameter
147     * `gvk` is an empty string, the stub refers to the first object with
148     * matching group and kind. 
149     *
150     * @param <O> the generic type
151     * @param <L> the generic type
152     * @param <R> the generic type
153     * @param objectClass the object class
154     * @param objectListClass the object list class
155     * @param client the client
156     * @param gvk the group, version and kind
157     * @param namespace the namespace
158     * @param name the name
159     * @param provider the provider
160     * @return the stub if the object exists
161     * @throws ApiException the api exception
162     */
163    @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.AvoidBranchingStatementAsLastInLoop",
164        "PMD.AvoidInstantiatingObjectsInLoops", "PMD.UseObjectForClearerAPI" })
165    public static <O extends KubernetesObject, L extends KubernetesListObject,
166            R extends K8sGenericStub<O, L>>
167            Optional<R> get(Class<O> objectClass, Class<L> objectListClass,
168                    ApiClient client, GroupVersionKind gvk, String namespace,
169                    String name, StubSupplier<O, L, R> provider)
170                    throws ApiException {
171        var group = gvk.getGroup();
172        var kind = gvk.getKind();
173        var version = gvk.getVersion();
174        var apiMatch = new Discovery(client).findAll().stream()
175            .filter(r -> r.getGroup().equals(group) && r.getKind().equals(kind)
176                && (Strings.isNullOrEmpty(version)
177                    || r.getVersions().contains(version)))
178            .findFirst();
179        if (apiMatch.isEmpty()) {
180            return Optional.empty();
181        }
182        var apiRes = apiMatch.get();
183        var finalVersion = Strings.isNullOrEmpty(version)
184            ? apiRes.getVersions().get(0)
185            : version;
186        return Optional
187            .of(provider.get(objectClass, objectListClass,
188                client, group, finalVersion, apiRes.getKind(),
189                apiRes.getResourcePlural(), namespace, name));
190    }
191
192    /**
193     * Retrieves and returns the current state of the object.
194     *
195     * @return the object's state
196     * @throws ApiException the api exception
197     */
198    public O state() throws ApiException {
199        var response = api.get(namespace, name).throwsApiException();
200        return response.getObject();
201    }
202
203    /**
204     * Updates the object's status.
205     *
206     * @param object the current state of the object (passed to `status`)
207     * @param status function that returns the new status
208     * @return the kubernetes api response
209     * @throws ApiException the api exception
210     */
211    public KubernetesApiResponse<O> updateStatus(O object,
212            Function<O, Object> status) throws ApiException {
213        return api.updateStatus(object, status).throwsApiException();
214    }
215
216    /**
217     * Updates the status.
218     *
219     * @param status the status
220     * @return the kubernetes api response
221     * @throws ApiException the api exception
222     */
223    public KubernetesApiResponse<O> updateStatus(Function<O, Object> status)
224            throws ApiException {
225        return updateStatus(
226            api.get(namespace, name).throwsApiException().getObject(), status);
227    }
228
229    /**
230     * Patch the object.
231     *
232     * @param patchType the patch type
233     * @param patch the patch
234     * @param options the options
235     * @return the kubernetes api response
236     * @throws ApiException the api exception
237     */
238    public KubernetesApiResponse<O> patch(String patchType, V1Patch patch,
239            PatchOptions options) throws ApiException {
240        return api.patch(namespace, name, patchType, patch, options)
241            .throwsApiException();
242    }
243
244    /**
245     * Patch the object using default options.
246     *
247     * @param patchType the patch type
248     * @param patch the patch
249     * @return the kubernetes api response
250     * @throws ApiException the api exception
251     */
252    public KubernetesApiResponse<O>
253            patch(String patchType, V1Patch patch) throws ApiException {
254        PatchOptions opts = new PatchOptions();
255        return patch(patchType, patch, opts);
256    }
257
258    /**
259     * A supplier for Stubs.
260     *
261     * @param <O> the object type
262     * @param <L> the object list type
263     * @param <R> the result type
264     */
265    public interface StubSupplier<O extends KubernetesObject,
266            L extends KubernetesListObject, R extends K8sGenericStub<O, L>> {
267
268        /**
269         * Gets the stub.
270         *
271         * @param objectClass the object class
272         * @param objectListClass the object list class
273         * @param client the client
274         * @param group the group
275         * @param version the version
276         * @param kind the kind
277         * @param plural the plural
278         * @param namespace the namespace
279         * @param name the name
280         * @return the r
281         */
282        @SuppressWarnings("PMD.UseObjectForClearerAPI")
283        R get(Class<O> objectClass, Class<L> objectListClass,
284                ApiClient client, String group, String version, String kind,
285                String plural, String namespace, String name);
286    }
287}
